name: Massive Media
overview:
Massive Media SA is an online media group that aims to bring people together in a fun, simple and efficient way. The company is based in Ghent and London and runs, among others, Netlog and Twoo. Massive Media was founded in 2000 by Lorenz Bogaert and Toon Coppens. In 2007, Index Ventures and Atomico invested in the company.

In January 2011, Netlog announced that the site would become part of Massive Media, a global media group, focusing mainly on social media, and allowing product portfolio to expand into new markets. In terms of shareholding, the current structure will remain unchanged.

An overview of Massive Media’s Businesses:

  1. Netlog is a social networking service where you can express yourself by building an interactive profile, sharing experiences and playing games. Netlog has over 50 million unique profiles and 25 million monthly unique visitors. http://www.netlog.com/

2.Twoo is the fun way to meet new people in your area. Thanks to intelligent matchmaking, you can make direct contact with real people in a fun, fast and simple way. Every day over 25.000 new people are joining Twoo. http://www.twoo.com/

  1. Cardwise enables consumers and businesses transact using prepaid credit cards on mobile, web and plastic.

Source: http://www.massivemedia.co.uk/
